verbs.description: It [V: 's] [ARG2: rare] [ARG1: the economics trumps geopolitics in the Middle East] , but it may pay off at the pump .
It 's rare the economics trumps [V: geopolitics] in the Middle East , but it may pay off at the pump .
It 's rare the economics trumps geopolitics in the Middle East , but it [V: may] pay off at the pump .
It 's rare the economics trumps geopolitics in the Middle East , but [ARG1: it] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: pay] off [ARGM-LOC: at the pump] .
